main event: An oval, white object was observed on the radar screen in Rogersville, Tennessee, in June 1954.
interesting points: The object remained visible on the radar for 1 to 2 minutes before disappearing., The sighting was documented on a Project 10073 Record Card., The report concludes the observation was reliable and considered possible aircraft or balloon., No photographs were included in the documentation., The observation involved ground-radar technology.
